sentences.en: But they, too, have been disrupted, and moderates are turning on those who espouse violence.
sentences.cn: 但他们, 同样, 被打乱了, 和减轻转动在那些拥护暴力.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, managers from the 11 South Korean companies operating there espouse the advantages of the zone.
sentences.cn: 与此同时, 在此运营的11家韩国公司的经理们对这里的优势赞不绝口.

sentences.en: People shelve the out - of - fashion moral icon and espouse the philosophy of egoism.
sentences.cn: 搁置了人民的时尚图标和拥护道德哲学的利己主义.

sentences.en: She ran away with him to Mexico and espoused the revolutionary cause.
sentences.cn: 她与他一起逃到了墨西哥，支持革命事业。

sentences.en: Some teachers enthusiastically espouse the benefits to be gained from educational software.
sentences.cn: 有些教师热烈赞同可以从教学软件中得到好处的观点.

trans.tran_cn: 嫁娶, 支持, 赞成
trans.tran_en: to support an idea, belief etc, especially a political one
to support an idea, belief etc, especially a political one
